name: TrueOrFalseAnimalEdition
0:
”Alexa, open animal questions”
”Give me a question”
”Buy the expansion pack”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal questions
des:
True Or False: Animal Edition will challenge what you think you know about your favorite animals!

Categories include:
- Dogs
- Cats
- Sea animals
- Primates
- Reptiles
- Dinosaurs
- AND MORE...

Do you think you can go on a 5 question streak? Let's find out. Enable the skill to get started. Whether you're answering the questions on your own, or working as a family, this skill is sure to be fun for everyone.

This skill offers an in-skill purchase to unlock over 100 new, curated questions that will be updated weekly to ensure this game never gets old!

If you have either:
- A feature suggestion
- A reason True Or False: Animal Edition deserves less than a 5-star review
Please reach out to us at: contact@sublimitylabs.com

We truly value customer feedback here at Sublimity Labs!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
